last_commit.message: fix: deterministic dedup in fetch-bookmarks — Python import script replaces shell pipes

recent_changes: FIXED: fetch-bookmarks dedup bug — created scripts/import_bookmarks.py with Python-set dedup (no shell pipes)
Rewrote /fetch-bookmarks skill as deterministic, prescriptive skill with exact tool calls per phase
Added data/fetch_logs/ for structured import logging

Migration COMPLETE: code-tab-as-orchestrator — updated CLAUDE.md, PROJECT_GUIDE.md, LEARNINGS.md, PROJECT_DECISIONS.md

Quote tweets not captured in schema or extraction (only quote_count stored)
44 links (41%) still lack LLM summaries — 19 are media URLs (unfetchable), 25 are x.com/tweet links
17+ media items lack vision analysis — limited by missing local_path
Obsidian v1.11.7 installed — needs update to 1.12+ for CLI support
/wrap-up command does not include git push — causes invisible work
Briefing generator produces double @@ in author handles
Pre-compact hook may not capture enough structured context (only STATUS.json)
